full_summary:
***Accommodations - Temecula, California - RFSA W6399-22CA46/B Upcoming Opportunity***

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Trade Agreement:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Government Tender Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No

**Supplier Details:**

* **Approximate Annual Requirement:** 2-3 stays in hotel or motel accommodations per year in the Temecula, California area over the next 3-5 years
* **Accommodations Required For:** Estimated 110 personnel with a variety of check in and check out dates over the course of three months, with individual stays estimated to last between 1 day and 50 days
* **Period for Awarding Contracts:** From the date of issue to 31 March 2027

**Background and Supplier Requirements:**

* Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification to allow new Suppliers to become qualified.
* Existing qualified Suppliers, who have been issued a Supply Arrangement, will not be required to submit a new arrangement.
* Multiple contracts may be awarded to separate Suppliers under RFPs resulting from this Supply Arrangement.

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: 2022-11-28
* Tender Closing Date: N/A - This opportunity is ongoing and Suppliers can submit their interest to become qualified at any time prior to the award period.
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A

**Materials and Information Required:**

* Trade Agreement: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Department of National Defence (DND)**
* **Email Contact:** [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Inquiries and Submissions:**

* Suppliers interested in participating in this opportunity should contact Webster, Sean, via email: [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca) or telephone: 873-354-9545 (approximately) or fax: 613-545-8067.
